Description: Category of metadata (e.g., Study, Individual, Biospecimen, Data File)

DependsOn: Component, Study Code, Study Abbreviation,Study Name,Study Description,Methods Description,Acknowledgment Statement, Project,Program,Grant Number

Description: Unique identifier for the study, assigned by the DCC
Valid Values: Longevity Consortium (LC),Longevity Genomics (LG),Integrative Longevity Omics (ILO),Long Life Family Study (LLFS)

Description: Abbreviation for the study, assigned by the data contributor
Name of the study, chosen by the data contributor
Description as worded by the data contributor - this will be displayed in the portal
Description as worded by the data contributor - this will be displayed in the portal
Description as worded by the data contributor - this will be displayed in the portal
Name of the project or cohort the study belongs to
The funding source for the study
The grant number the study is associated with

DependsOn: Study Code,Individual ID,External ID,Field Center Code,Visit Code,Country Code,Data Contribution Group,Species Code,Family ID,Father ID,Mother ID,MZ Twin ID,Sex,Race,Ethnicity,Age,Height,BMI,Years Smoked,Exercise Activity

Description: Unique identifier for the individual, assigned by the DCC
Unique identifier for the individual, assigned by the data contributor (e.g. a subject ID)
Name of the field center
Indicate the visit status for the individual
Indicate the geographic region for the individual
Identifier assigned to a data contributor
Indicate the consent group for the individual
Indicate for the species to which the individual belongs
Unique identifier for the family to which the individual belongs
Individual ID for Individual's father
Individual ID for Individual's mother
Monozygotic Twin ID
Sex of individual
Race of individual
Valid Values: White,Black or African American,Asian,More than one race,American Indian or Alaska Native,Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander,Other,Prefer not to answer,Unknown

Description: Ethnicity of individual
Valid Values: Not Hispanic or Latino, Hispanic or Latino, Prefer not to answer,Unknown

Description: Age in days at last clinic/home visit
Average Stand Height in cm collected at last visit
Derived BMI (kg/m**2)
# Packs/day * yrs smoke(d)
Level of weekly physical exercise

DependsOn: Component,Study Code,Individual ID,Diagnosis Status,Condition Source,HPO Label,HPO Code,MONDO Label,MONDO Code,MAXO Label,MAXO Code,Other Label,Other Code

Description: Whether the individual has been diagnosed with a condition or disease (physical and/or cognitive), "True" indicates the individual has been diagnosed
Whether condition information was obtained from medical records (Clinical) or patient survey (Self-Reported)
Label for condition in the Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO)
Code for condition in the Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO)
Label for condition in the Mondo Disease Ontology (MONDO)
Code for condition in the Mondo Disease Ontology (MONDO)
Label for condition in the Medical Action Ontology (MAXO)
Code for condition in the Medical Action Ontology (MAXO)
Label for condition in another ontology (if no match in HPO, MONDO, or MAXO)
Code for condition in another ontology (if no match in HPO, MONDO, or MAXO)

DependsOn: Component,Individual ID,Specimen ID,Specimen Source,Specimen Type,Specimen Age,Parent Specimen ID,Parent Specimen Type,Laboratory Procedure

Description: Unique identifier for the specimen or sample
The repository or database to which a specimenID maps; or, the group or lab that generated the specimen. For cell culture studies, the commercial source or lab that generated the cells
Type of biological material comprising the Specimen
Age in days of individual at time of biospecimen collection
Unique identifier for the direct Parent from which the Specimen was derived, processed, pooled, etc. (if applicable)
Type of biological material comprising the Parent Specimen (if applicable)
Procedure by which the Specimen was derived from Parent Specimen (if applicable)

DependsOn: Component,Individual ID,Specimen ID,File ID,Consent Code,Data Access,Original File Name,Filename,Data Category,Data Type,Experimental Strategy,Access URL,Format,Type,Size

Description: File identifier, assigned by the DCC
Code identifying level of consent, assigned by the DCC
Type of access control on this file, determined by the DCC
Name of file, assigned by data contributor
Synapse ID for file
General category of data in file
Valid Values: Clinical, Genomics, Proteomics, Metabolomics, Lipidomics,Immune profiling, Transcriptomics, Methylomics,Metagenomics,Epigenetics,Pharmacology,

Description: Specific type of data contained in file
Valid Values: Gene expression, Gene fusions, Genomic variants,SNP Array,Analysis,

Description: Experimental method used to obtain data in file
Valid Values: Whole genome sequencing, Whole exome sequencing,RNAseq, scRNAseq,bulk RNAseq,16s rRNA sequencing,Whole genome bisulfite sequencing,Mass spec proteomics, Mass spec metabolomics,

Description: Storage location for this file
Format of file
Valid Values: csv,tsv, cram, gvcf, vcf, maf, txt, pdf, html, png

Description: Type of file
Size of file
Name of the metadata template used
